title: Random text keeps popping up whenever I open keypad from a couple of weeks
content:
A random text(the same one always) is shown in the clipboard everytime I open keypad. I even deleted it from the clipboard multiple times. 
I found the same issue posted in oneplus community, attaching it for clarity. I don't think the solution suggested there is available for pixel

https://forums.oneplus.com/threads/random-text-is-being-copied-automatically.1387991/
